recommendations.node_path: Metastatic Breast Cancer Treatment Decision (ESMO 2021/24) -> Initial Biopsy, Biomarker & Staging Assessment (updated) -> Breast Cancer Subtype Classification -> Triple‑Negative Breast Cancer (TNBC) -> TNBC Second‑line (requires prior progression)
